column1: Little Goat Diner////Executive Summary: Overall I found the service and friendly atmosphere to be as outstanding as at Girl and the Goat. I couldn't have been more satisfied.  The food and cocktails were good
column2: just not amazing. We tried the Fat Elvis Waffles
column5: I had CRAZY HIGH expectations from my experiences at Girl & the Goat
column7: but I wasn't wowed by anything
column8: which I anticipated from amazing dining experiences  at Girl & the Goat.  It was all good
column9: just nothing to write home about.  Because of the great service and atmosphere
column11: I would definitely give it another try and also return to try the dinner/lunch menu.
